title: DPM Dar offers prayers at Masjid-e-Nabvi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 09 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Saturday visited the holy city of Madinah and offered prayers at Masjid-e-Nabwi.
The deputy prime minister is on his official visit to Saudi Arabia to attend the Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) Council of Foreign Ministers meeting.
He prayed for peace, unity, and prosperity for the Muslim Ummah, according to a statement issued by the office of the Deputy Prime Minister.
